articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Chonji Lubricant Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Chonji Lubricant Factory
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Chonji Lubricant Factory.
					 He was briefed on the history of the factory.
					
					 He said with deep emotion: "Visiting the factory established thanks to the undying patriotic feats of leader Kim Jong Il, the one handed down to the younger generation as results of the hardships experienced by himself, I feel very sorry for failing to show him this modern splendid factory even once. This factory is a posthumous one."
					
					 Noting that this factory alone clearly shows how many seeds Kim Jong Il sowed for the building of a rich and powerful country, he said  in an excited tone that everybody should never forget the devoted efforts made by Kim Jong Il for the country and its people for decades.
					
					 He looked round the analysis room, general production control room, lubricant work team, grease work team and other places of the factory to learn in detail about technical specifications of production processes and production there.
					
					 He highly appreciated the factory as the one in which all production processes were put on an automatic, IT and unmanned basis and the digitalized one which fully established a computerized coordinated production system. 
					
					 Pleased that the factory is turning out with indigenous efforts and technology the products for which it relied on import in the past period, he instructed it to wage a dynamic drive for boosting the production of quality lubricant and grease required by all types of vehicles and providing them to various fields of the national economy in the future.
					
					 Saying that the quality of goods produced by the factory is as good as the imported ones, he called for steadily improving the technical specifications of the lubricant and grease so that they may have international competitiveness.
					
					 He gave precious instructions for managing and operating the factory.
					
					 Noting that it is something to be proud of to have the modern Chonji Lubricant Factory of world level, he said again it was really pity that he failed to show Kim Jong Il this factory.
					
					 He showed such loving care for Kye Chol Ryong, manager of the factory, and its officials as expressing thanks to them on the spot in the name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea for having worked hard to implement the party policies, always bearing them deep in mind.
					
					 Expressing expectation and conviction that the workers of the factory would glorify in practice the behests of Kim Jong Il by rapidly boosting the production, he had a photo session with its employees.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il and Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Vientiane
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Vientiane
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to Asian countries arrived in Vientiane on Monday.
					 It was greeted at the airport by officials concerned of the Foreign Ministry of Laos and the DPRK ambassador to Laos.
					
					 On the same day, it laid a wreath before the Tower to the Fallen Fighters of the Laotian People's Army and visited That Luang, a historic site.

articles.title: 13th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies Closed
articles.content:
13th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies Closed
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The 13th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies closed Tuesday with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House.
					 The exhibition, opened on July 29, showcased the invention successes made by scientists, technicians and other people of the DPRK in the efforts to rapidly develop the core basic technologies and all other scientific and technological fields and efficiently solve the issues arising in improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 There took place a technological lecture, scientific and technological presentation and technological exchange of intellectual goods during the exhibition.
					
					 The closing ceremony was attended by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned and scientists, technicians and inventors.
					
					 More than 100 persons were awarded gold medals.
					
					 Cups, medals and certifications were conferred on organizations, scientists, technicians and other people who proved successful at the exhibition.
					
					 Choe Sang Gon, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, made a closing address.

articles.title: National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Closes
articles.content:
National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Closes
 Hamhung, August 5 (KCNA) -- A national Taekwon-Do all-star tournament for Jonsung Cup closed with due ceremony in Hamhung City Tuesday. It opened on July 28.
					 Players proved successful in Taekwon-Do and Paduk (go) matches by giving full play to high technique they cultivated in their day-to-day training.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Kwang Ho, chairman of the South Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned, sports persons, youth and students.
					
					 Cups and medals were awarded to players who proved successful in the matches.
					
					 Ri Yong Son, vice-chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, made a closing address.

articles.title: Long-Distance Belt Conveyor Altering Map of Kumsanpho
articles.content:
Long-Distance Belt Conveyor Altering Map of Kumsanpho
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- It has been at least 40 years since a long-distance belt conveyor for discharging waste ore was installed between the Unryul Mine and the West Sea of Korea. In this period, several thousand meters-long embankment took its appearance on the West Sea, linking Sohaeri Peninsula to Nunggum and Chongryang islets.
					 The embankment by the conveyor made it possible to build a ring road between Wolsa-ri, Kwail County and Sohaeri Peninsula via Nunggum islet with several thousand hectares of land dammed.
					
					 Meanwhile, a forestation project has been steadily pushed forward along the embankment, thus turning it into the home of different animals and birds like wild rabbits and pheasants.
					
					 Now the conveyor is building an embankment towards Sok islet from Nunggum islet.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Murder and Assault in S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Murder and Assault in S. Korean Puppet Army 
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Private First Class Yun belonging to the 28th Division of the south Korean puppet army had been subject to repeated beating, violence, insult, etc. by his superiors and died due to group violence on April 7.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article the recent murder of Yun was not an accidental case but an inevitable crime which occurred in the puppet army as it keeps to the road of treachery and confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north as a colonial mercenary army of the U.S.
					
					 The article goes on: The puppet army whose right to command operations is in the hands of the U.S. serves the American master, not the south Koreans. It has played the role of servants of the U.S. in its moves to provoke a war against the DPRK for decades.
					
					 After being conscripted into the puppet army, lots of young people are being brutalized to commit man killings and plunder, steeped in extreme misanthropy and hostility toward the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The puppet army is no more than a rabble kept afloat by mutual mistrust, physical torture and club discipline. It is common practice in the army that shooting each other to death, group violence and other extreme human rights abuses are taking place.
					
					 Shooting sprees, suicides and murders that are unabated in the army go to prove that extreme war-phobia, assaults and violence have become endemic among the puppet army soldiers.
					
					 No one can vouch that such a shocking case as that of Yun will not occur in south Korea again.
					
					 Yun's murder case is now touching off deep mistrust and repugnance towards the puppet army among south Koreans from all walks of life, once again throwing the conservative authorities into a quagmire.
					
					 It is unbearable shame on the Korean nation that such brutal and corrupt army exists in south Korea. Therefore, it deserves unanimous curse and denunciation by the south Koreans.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Exposes True Appearance of S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Exposes True Appearance of S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A freshman of the 28th Division of the south Korean puppet army was disclosed to have been beaten to death due to a group assault. This has given a great shock to the south Korean society.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The case clearly showed the true appearance of the extremely corrupt puppet army and proved that the puppet army is a group of devils obsessed by misanthropy and brutality. 
					
					 The puppet authorities are entirely to blame for turning the puppet army into a den of rabid dogs.
					
					 Prevalent in the ROK army fabricated by the U.S. imperialists is the American-style "barracks culture" that calls for establishing "military discipline" with physical torture and drubbing, while regarding the brutal nature and violence as the "spirit of soldier".
					
					 The puppet army has thus positively encouraged curses and beating in a bid to turn soldiers into slaves blindly obeying the orders of superiors, not human beings using their own brains. 
					
					 Unbearable violence has made shooting sprees and suicides daily occurrences in the puppet army.
					
					 The situation goes to prove that the puppet ruling forces are the arch criminal and heinous murderer pushing the soldiers to death.
					
					 Such tragic situation will continue in south Korea as long as fascist hooligans hold a firm grip on power and train the puppet army as murderers and prod them to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and provoke a war against the DPRK.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails Hideous Human Rights Abuses of GIs
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails Hideous Human Rights Abuses of GIs
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Two American soldiers based in Italy recently raped a pregnant Romanian woman.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says this clearly proves that the U.S. soldiers are a group of beasts in human skin.
					
					 American soldiers, obsessed by extreme misanthropy and immorality and depravity, feel the biggest pleasure in killing the weak and teasing them as they please, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 This is the main reason why human rights abuses shocking people are perpetrated wherever American soldiers go.
					
					 What matters is that such hideous human rights abuses of the American soldiers are being committed at the tacit connivance of the U.S. military authorities and under their patronage.
					
					 As far as south Korea is concerned, it is the U.S. military authorities who have the right to handle GI criminals under the SOFA. That is why GIs based overseas exercise extraterritorial rights, unhesitatingly revealing their barbarous nature.
					
					 The U.S. forces are a group of the world's worst criminals and beasts.
					
					 It will not be possible to put an end to the misfortune and pain of the people in the region nor is it possible to ensure regional peace and security as long as such a group of criminals are allowed to go scot-free.
					
					 All countries and nations should have the U.S. forces go back to  their den.

articles.title: U.S. Reinforces Fighters in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Reinforces Fighters in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The United States deployed 12 more F-15E fighters in the Osan U.S. Air Force Base on August 1, according to a south Korean paper.
					 More than 350 U.S. imperialist aggression troops were sent for the operation of the fighters.
					
					 The fighters from an air force base in Idaho State, the U.S. will reportedly take part in the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills to be kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group.
					
					 The massive reinforcement of fighters with the mission of preemptive attacks for the U.S. forces present in south Korea clearly reveals the true colors of the U.S. as the chief criminal wrecking the peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over it.

articles.title: S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Blamed for Insulting Bereaved Families of Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean "Saenuri Party" Blamed for Insulting Bereaved Families of Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A south Korean media in an article on Monday denounced the "Saenuri Party" for insulting the bereaved families of the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 A lawmaker from the "Saenuri Party" insulted the bereaved family members in their hunger strike outside the building of the "National Assembly" demanding the institution of a special law for the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster as outdoor sleepers on August 1, the media noted, and went on:
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" begged for a chance while trumpeting about sort of "reform" with its forehead knocking on the ground for an apology for the disaster even at the time of the local election.
					
					 But the special law demanded by the bereaved families has not yet been instituted. Had the NA fully discharged its duty, they would not have staged the actions for such a long time.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" should not forget that the people are closely following it.

articles.title: Typhoon Hits S. Korea
articles.content:
Typhoon Hits S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Different parts of south Korea were hit by typhoon on August 2 and 3, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The typhoon left seven people dead in Chongdo of North Kyongsang Province and several others dead or wounded in Kochang of South Kyongsang Province, Wando and Ryosu of South Jolla Province and on Jeju Island.
					
					 Dwelling houses were submerged and many hectares of cropland were inundated in Posong and Kohung of South Jolla Province.
					
					 The typhoon also destroyed roads in the areas of Janghung, Sunchon and Kwangyang of South Jolla Province.
					
					 Electricity supply to more than 13 000 dwelling houses was suspended in Kwangju City, South Jolla and South Kyongsang provinces and on Jeju Island.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Stage Demos in Protest against S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Crackdown
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Stage Demos in Protest against S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Crackdown
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. are staging demonstrations in protest against the south Korean puppet authorities' fascist crackdown upon suspects of the attempted rebellion, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 Koreans in the U.S. staged a demonstration outside the puppet consulate general in New York on August 1 condemning the south Korean present regime and prosecution for their moves to fake up the case of the attempted rebellion.
					
					 The participants denounced the prosecution, the waiting maid of the regime, for inflicting heavy penalties on those victims related to the case again though evidence proving the case to be a fabrication and distortion were given at trials.
					
					 The court should make a decision based on justice and truth, not yielding to the pressure of the regime and prosecution, they noted, adding:
					
					 Overseas Koreans will fight it out in solidarity to have the Intelligence Service, the source of evils, be dissolved and the regime oust.
					
					 A solidarity statement was read out. 
					
					 The statement urged the judicial authorities to acquit those charged with the attempted rebellion.
					
					 On July 31, Koreans in the U.S. staged a demonstration outside the puppet consulate general in Los Angeles.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Serves as Textbook for Progressives: Bulgarian Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Serves as Textbook for Progressives: Bulgarian Personage
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" serves as a precious textbook for the progressives aspiring after socialism.
					 Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, said this at the releasing ceremony of the work held at a publishing house of Bulgaria on July 29.
					
					 In a speech he noted that the work is replete with Kim Jong Un's firm will to successfully carry forward the cause of Juche, the cause of Songun pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and accomplish it through generations.
					
					 The succession to leader's cause is a key to preserving and accomplishing the socialist cause, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in booklet by a Bulgarian publishing house.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and indicates the tasks for thoroughly defending, adhering to and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on July 29.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Observe Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Observe Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups from July 26 to 28 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. They were accompanied by photos documenting the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in leading the war to victory.
					 The Iranian paper Iran News in an article titled "History of victory" said that the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world bent its knees before the Korean people on July 27, 1953.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 The DPRK, not a big country in the East, wrought such a miracle as beating back the aggression forces of the U.S. and its satellite forces for the first time in history.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK overwhelmed the numerical and technical superiorities of the enemy with politico-ideological, strategic and tactical superiorities.
					
					 July 27 is the day of great victory for the Korean people when they shattered to smithereens the myth of the U.S. "mightiness" and defended the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The Egyptian paper Al Misaiya in an article titled "July 27 of the DPRK" noted that the army and people of the DPRK achieved a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War under the wise guidance of the illustrious commander.
					
					 The Nepalese paper Gorkha Express also carried articles praising the undying exploits performed by Kim Il Sung in winning a victory.
					
					 The Myanmar paper The New Age dedicated one whole page to the photos showing the feats performed by the heroic soldiers of the Korean People's Army during the Fatherland Liberation War and disclosing the U.S. imperialists' defeat in the war.
					
					 The paper carried an article titled "DPRK celebrates the day of victory in war." The preface of the article said that the world progressives will always remember the historic event in which the Korean people beat back the U.S. imperialist aggressors.

articles.title: Paper of Czech Republic Supports DPRK's Measures for Bolstering up Military Capability
articles.content:
Paper of Czech Republic Supports DPRK's Measures for Bolstering up Military Capability
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Now that the ceaseless military drills being waged by the U.S. on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity are provocative in their nature, it is very just that the DPRK is bolstering up its military capability, said the paper of the Czech Republic Halo Noviny on Aug. 1 in an article titled "DPRK is exercising its right to self-defense".
					 The UN Security Council on July 17 "condemned" the DPRK at an unofficial meeting in which it termed even the launch of short-range missiles by the DPRK a violation of the so-called "resolution", the paper said, and continued:
					
					 Each country has the right to defend oneself and develop arms and equipment.
					
					 The recent firing of tactical rockets by the DPRK is part of the exercise of such a right.
					
					 The U.S. launched numbers of missiles in their military drills against the DPRK and openly staged actual maneuvers with nuclear hardware involved, but the UN has never called this into question.
					
					 No one can vouch that the military drills staged by the U.S. will not go over into an all-out invasion of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Lubricante Chonji
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Lubricante Chonji
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Lubricante Chonji.
					Primero, escucho las explicaciones sobre el historial de la fabrica.
					
					Esta fabrica nacio gracias a las hazanas patrioticas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y fue legada a las futuras generaciones a cambio de las pruebas sufridas por el, dijo el Mariscal y continuo que le duele mucho por no haberle mostrado esta fabrica modernizada al Dirigente y ella es hija postuma de el.
					
					Solo con ver esta fabrica, se puede conocer que el Dirigente planto muchas semillas para la construccion de una patria prospera, apunto y agrego que no se debe olvidar nunca la abnegacion e infatigables esfuerzos del Dirigente por la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la fabrica inclusive la sala de analisis, la de mando general de produccion, los equipos de trabajo de lubricante, grasa y proyeccion, averiguo en detalles las especificaciones tecnicas de los procesos productivos y el estado de produccion.
					
					Evaluo la fabrica como la digitalizada diciendo que todos los procesos productivos son automatizados e informatizados y aqui se ha establecido perfectamente el sistema de produccion integral computarizado.
					
					Complacido de que se fabricaran con las fuerzas y tecnicas domesticas los productos que se importaban antes, instruyo desplegar dinamicamente la lucha por fabricar mucha cantidad de lubricantes y grasas de buena calidad, necesarios para los medios de transporte de todo tipo, y enviarlos a varias ramas de economia nacional.
					
					Diciendo que la calidad de los productos de esta fabrica no es inferior a la de los importados, destaco que se debe renovar sin parar los indices tecnicos de ellos para que tengan la competitividad mundial.
					
					El Mariscal dio instrucciones valiosas para la administracion empresarial.
					
					Nos pone orgullosos tener esta  fabrica de nivel mundial, dijo y volvio a expresar lastima por no haberla mostrado al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Expreso agradecimiento en nombre del Comite Central del PTC al gerente Kye Chol Ryong y otros funcionarios de la fabrica que se esfuerzan mucho por cumplir las politicas del Partido asimilandolas letra por letra.
					
					Expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que los obreros de la fabrica cumpliran con el aumento de produccion el legado del Dirigente, tomo una foto de recuerdo con los empleados.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunta Jon Sun Hui
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunta Jon Sun Hui
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 4 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de la difunta Jon Sun Hui, ex combatiente revolucionaria antijaponesa, en senal de profundas condolencias por su deceso.

articles.title: Clausurada XIII Exposicion Nacional de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnicas
articles.content:
Clausurada XIII Exposicion Nacional de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnicas
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurada el dia 5 la XIII Exposicion Nacional de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnicas, inaugurada el 29 de julio.
					En este evento se exhiben los inventos de los cientificos, tecnicos y trabajadores de Corea hechos en su empeno por desarrollar vertiginosamente las ciencias y tecnicas inclusive la tecnologia basica y resolver sustancialmente los problemas que surgen en la construccion economica y el mejoramiento de la vida popular.
					
					Durante la exposicion tuvieron lugar la leccion tecnica, la presentacion de ciencias y tecnicas, etc. y se realizo activamente el intercambio tecnico de los productos intelectuales.
					
					En la ceremonia de clausura, que tuvo lugar este martes en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones, estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, el vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Yong Jin, el presidente del Comite de Educacion, Kim Sung Du, el presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Jang Chol, los funcionarios de la rama interesada, asi como los cientificos, tecnicos e inventores.
					
					En la ocasion se publico la decision del jurado.
					
					Se otorgaron medallas de oro a mas de cien personas que presentaron los exitos valiosos.
					
					Se concedieron las copas, medallas y diplomas a las entidades y los cientificos, tecnicos y trabajadores sobresalientes y hubo la premiacion correspondiente.
					
					Las palabras de clausura estuvieron a cargo de Choe Sang Gon, presidente del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnicas

articles.title: Clausurada Competencia Nacional de Fuertes Taekwondocas por la Copa Jonsung
articles.content:
Clausurada Competencia Nacional de Fuertes Taekwondocas por la Copa Jonsung
						
Hamhung, 5 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurada la Competencia Nacional de Fuertes Taekwondocas por la Copa Jonsung, inaugurada el 28 de julio.
					En este certamen dividido en Taekwondo y Paduk (go-chess) los jugadores obtuvieron buenos exitos usando su tecnica y habilidad adiestradas en los entrenamientos cotidianos.
					
					La ceremonia de clausura se efectuo hoy en Hamhung con la participacion del secretario responsable del Comite del Partido de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Thae Jong Su, el presidente del Comite Popular de la misma provincia, Jon Kwang Ho, los funcionarios de la rama interesada, los deportistas, los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					Se otorgaron las copas, medallas y premios a los jugadores que vencieron en los partidos de Taekwondo y Paduk de todas las categorias.
					
					El vicepresidente del Comite de Taekwondo de Corea, Ri Yong Son, pronuncio el discurso de clausura.
